thread.title: Warning for motorists using M4 in Berkshire tonight
thread.title_full: Warning for motorists using M4 in Berkshire tonight | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Warning for motorists using M4 in Berkshire tonight
text:
M4 through Berkshire Credit: ITV news The Highways Agency has issued a warning to motorists using the M4 in Berkshire tonight. The motorway will be closed eastbound between junctions 5 and 6 for Slough between 10pm and 6am tomorrow morning.
It comes after a day of chaos for commuters due to a 48 hour strike by unions on Great Western Trains and a strike on the London Underground. The Highways Agency says the closure is essential for urgent technology maintenance work and that a clearly signed diversion will be in place via the A4 Bath Road/London Road through Slough.
Last updated Thu 9 Jul 2015 Read more 2 updates Warning for motorists using M4 in Berkshire tonight Travel Berkshire
